    GameModel

    • Uses of World in GameModel

      Fields in GameModel declared as World 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      World GameSimulation.w
      The World that has the GameSimulation running.
      Methods in GameModel with parameters of type World 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Area.setSunny(boolean sunny, World w, Player p)
      The method will change the room to be a Sunny Room.
      void Bomb.use(Player p, World w)
      If the room defined by p is bombable, it will do the appropriate bomb effects.
      Constructors in GameModel with parameters of type World 
      Constructor and Description
      GameSimulation(World w)
      The constructor for this will spawn Mobs in their appropriate starting locations within the passed World object and adds them to the mobs list
      SunWand(World w)
      Construct a Sun Wand by setting the name and description.
